history.proof: qblast use: @Korder_identity, @disc_incr_unit unfold: DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra, unit_element, increasing, equiv_Join, join, Krelation.

exceptions.exn: No such bound variable J (no bound variables at all in the expression).

original: apply ikiM_uSA with (J := J). intros m n m1 m2 Hjoin HKrel. destruct (residual_extensible m) as [e [v Hjoin1]]. exists m1, m2. split. - apply Hjoin. - split. -- apply PreOrder_Reflexive, po_R. -- apply PreOrder_Reflexive, po_R.
